text: Washington Redskins Marching Band banner Washington Redskins Marching Band at 4th of July parade in Fairfax, Virginia The Washington Football Team Marching Band is the marching band for the Washington Football Team, . Founded in 1937, they are the oldest marching band of the National Football League. While the team was known as the Redskins, they were noted for performing the fight song, "Hail to the Redskins", after each touchdown scored by them at home games. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Washington Football Team Category:Musical groups established in 1937 Category:1937 establishments in Washington, D.C. Category:NFL marching bands
title: Washington Football Team Marching Band
